numbered_ace_sentences: 1. There are far fewer head coaches of color than players of color.
2. This pattern is constant throughout the graphs.
3. I wonder why the number of head coaches of color is so low compared to the number of players of color.
5. In my community, many people of color participate in sports.
6. It may be difficult for people of color to relate to their coaches.
7. It may be difficult for people of color to connect with their coaches.
8. The headline is: The difference between head coaches of color and players of color among different sport leagues.
